DOC.brief_title: The Effect Inpatient Home-work Exercise Program Leg Function After Stroke
DOC.detailed_description: In total 120 participant admit stroke rehabilitation province British Columbia , Canada randomly assign either Leg Exercise group Leg Management group . The extra leg exercise group ( experimental group ) receive usual therapy plus 60 minute per day self-directed leg exercise . This program last 4 week participant hospital . The Leg Exercise program include exercise range motion , leg strengthening , weight-bearing , walk . The family encourage participate program participant . The control group ( Leg Management group ) receive usual therapy stroke education .
